property_address: Private room in home in Phoenix, Arizona, United States
listing_description: Perfect for short term stays! Check out my cozy single family home has 3 beds, 2 baths located in a quiet neighborhood in North Phoenix. Home is located within 5 minutes to I-17, 101 freeway, Deer Valley Airport, Honor Health Hospital, Deer Valley and Norterra shopping centers.The spaceUpon entering the home you will be greeted with a bright open living room with high vaulted ceilings, the living room flows into the open dining room that has French doors leading to the spacious backyard. Backyard has perfect outdoor living space with a covered patio, sofa seating, flat screen tv, and fire pit. Perfect to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning or catch the sunset in the evening.Living room offers sectional sofa and 65in smart TVDining room has beautiful marble table to accommodate seating for 4Kitchen equipped with refrigerator, stove, dish washer, garbage disposal, built in microwave, kuerig and all other kitchen essentials All common areas will be shared with one other guestBedroom 1 ( Master Suite): Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom spacious room has walk in closet, furnished with king size bed and bedding, 1 night stand, 1 lamp, 8 drawer dresser with mirror, 6 drawer chest, small 2 drawer dresser inside closet, full length body mirror, and 42in TV. This room offers plenty of space and storage. Also bedroom door is equipped with smart lock.Bedroom 2 (Guest Bedroom):  Has private hallway bath, maybe vacant or rented to 1 other guest.Access to full size washer and dryer located in the garage.Driveway/street parking I like to keep my home clean, tidy and quiet so no pets and no smoking allowedOther things to noteSingle family home rented by the room. Max guest is one person per room. At full capacity home will only have max occupancy of two people, one person per room. No access to third bedroom, it is used for storage.

property_address: Room in Phoenix, Arizona, United States
listing_description:
Our home is ideal for a single or a couple who is visiting Arizona and would like a cozy, comfortable place to use as a home base.  We have a large family who uses the pool often, so that is very much a shared space.  If you let us know ahead of time that you would like privacy, we can try to accommodate.  Please   let us know if you plan to invite a few friends over to share the pool so we can plan accordingly.The spaceComfy poolside room with private bathroom, in a quiet beautiful neighborhood.  We have now put a four poster queen sized bed in the room with a super high quality luxury mattress!!  Sooo comfy, you won't want to get out of bed!  Private entrance, and door to the pool.  Private bathroom.  This room is at the opposite end of the house from the rest of the rooms, so you will have lots of privacy.  Walk to the park.  Cable, easy free parking, five minutes from two malls, 12 minutes from downtown Phoenix, 25 minutes from Tempe and Scottsdale, easy access to Interstate 17 and the 51 freeway.  
We think you'll love our home!Guest accessYou can park for free on the street directly in front of our house.During your stayWe would love to help you in whatever way we can to make your stay more enjoyable, but we are not always home.  We are pretty busy with lots of family and lots of activity, so if you prefer to stay in a home where the hosts are always available, this may not be the place for you.Other things to noteThe pool is available for you to use. If sitting outside or swimming after 9:00pm and before 8:00am, please be very quiet. Voices carry and we want to be mindful of our neighbors. Please note, the jacuzzi does not heat up.

property_address: Entire guest house in Chandler, Arizona, United States
listing_description: Enjoy an experience unlike any other at our mini ranch in the heart of Chandler.  After a day of sunshine in the beautiful Sonoran desert, retreat to your private La Cabra Casita. Relax by the pool, grill up some dinner, feed the goats and alpacas, and in the morning enjoy some fresh duck and chicken eggs.The spaceCountry living in the city.  Close to stores and restaurants.Amenities Include:*Free Wifi*Smart TV*King-sized, memory foam bed*Studio kitchen with cooking and dining necessities included*All linens provided*Stylish, concrete floors*Large windows that line the space*Outdoor patio with modern lounge chairs and a cafe table*Grill for shared use*Citrus trees and cacti *Mini ranch with goats, alpacas, chickens, and ducks*Private entranceThis beautiful Casita sits in a quiet neighborhood of horse properties in the heart of Chandler.  It is an open, light, peaceful and private retreat perfect for 2 people.  Guests enjoy a unique experience of desert home and landscape while on a mini ranch.  This is a comfortable, relaxing place that delights the senses.  The casita is situated on the side of the property with a private entrance.  It opens up to an inviting and beautiful pool, citrus trees, cacti, outdoor cafe table and chairs, and stylish outdoor lounge chairs that let you enjoy the breathtaking Sonoran Desert sunsets.  On the other side of the property is a pasture with our goats, alpacas, chickens, and ducks who you can visit and feed. The main house sits in the middle, and we have our own patios and outdoor living spaces. La Cabra Casita (The Goat Casita) has been designed with you in mind and has all of the amenities that you will enjoy including a comfortable memory foam, king-sized bed, a fully functional kitchenette, and a thoughtfully designed space that features many found elements, custom made furnishings, and salvaged industrial materials.  You are welcome to grill up some dinner on the patio, and we love to share fresh chicken and duck eggs for your breakfasts.Come enjoy this unique space for your next visit to Chandler!Guest accessThe casita sits on the side of the property, and guests have their own parking space and private entrance.  They will have access to the pool and their own backyard patio spaces.

property_address: Entire guest suite in Sedona, Arizona, United States
listing_description: It doesn’t get better than this! This darling boutique studio casita is the perfect getaway for two adventurous travelers looking to experience beautiful Sedona. You will enjoy luxurious hotel-grade linens, a private kitchenette, and dreamy views on your own private patio for two. And wait, did we mention the location? You can WALK to Chapel of the Holy Cross and top Sedona hiking trails right from your door. This is the perfect spot to enjoy all that Sedona has to offer. We'd love to host you!The spaceWelcome to Dreamy Chapel Getaway, your relaxing oasis walking distance from world class hiking and the Chapel of the Holy Cross. This studio casita features high end design that has been selected and curated to give our guests the ultimate boutique experience. You will enjoy the luxurious queen bed with high-end, hotel-grade linens and the adorable kitchenette where you will be able to make a fresh cup of coffee (provided), uncork your favorite bottle of wine, or store your hiking snacks. Want to work remotely with a view? There is also a desk situated in front of the main window that offers million-dollar views of the Red Rocks. This is the perfect spot for a romantic getaway or a fun trip for friends. You will enjoy the amazing views and an unbeatable location. And guess what? Don’t worry about parking at busy trailheads as you can WALK to Mystic Trailhead, Little Horse Trailhead, and Chapel of the Holy Cross right from the front door. BED✔ Queen bed✔ High quality oh-so comfortable mattresses✔ Hotel-grade luxury linensKITCHENETTE✔ Fully equipped ✔ Provided tea + coffee✔ Mini-fridge✔ Stainless steel appliances BATHROOM✔  Supplied shampoo, conditioner & body wash✔  Walk-in shower✔  En suite to studioPARKING & ATTRACTIONS✔ Avoid crowded trailheads and walk right from your door✔ 7 Minute drive to Tlaquepaque✔ 7 Minute drive to Village of Oak Creak✔ 10 Minute drive to Uptown SedonaPicture this: you wake up after a deep slumber and quietly tip-toe your way to the kitchenette to brew a fresh pot of coffee. Soon, you have a hot cup of joe in your hand, steam gently rolling off the top of your mug. You look out the huge picture window and see the magical desert sun cresting over the Red Rocks. You unlock the deadbolt, swing open the front door, and are greeted by the most majestic sunrise you’ve ever seen. You take the first step out the front door and nestle into one of the patio chairs on the front patio. It’s incredibly quiet and peaceful as you have this place all to yourself. You take the first sip of coffee and watch as the early morning light dances across the rock formations. The rocks start as a deep red, reflecting the sun’s intensity. The light begins shifting and shadows appear as the day grows older. Moments like this are what you dreamed of when planning your trip to Sedona, and now you are living it.Guest accessYou will have access to the entire studio. Please note that this property is shared with a home that is also rented on Airbnb. If you have a larger group, please inquire about renting the house and studio together.Other things to noteThis studio apartment is separated from the house by a 2-car garage. There are no shared walls between the home and studio apartment.
